"@Shadow_the_Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53def16363687253031e0100#post_53def16363687253031e0100
The studio that made My Neighbor Totoro, Grave of the Fireflies, Spirited away and such.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@Shadow_the_Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53def16363687253031e0100#post_53def16363687253031e0100
The studio that put out Princess Mononoke, My Neighbor Totoro, and Spirited Away just to name my favorites of their films. They made a lot more and all are gorgeously animated, beautiful, imaginative movies that you should go watch immediately.

I hope we get to finally see it since the studio is closing down.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53def3526368725a660c0000#post_53def3526368725a660c0000
I did not know that. I did know that when the movie was first released stateside its first distributor was Troma Films.

Also according to an update on "this":http://www.escapistmagazine.com/news/view/136606-REPORT-Studio-Ghibli-May-Be-Shutting-Down-UPDATED article they *might* not be shutting down and the announcement was really more of a translation error.
